title: Ziggs old ult looked better.
body:
I mean really, Ziggs didn't need this VFX update at all. I would much rather have some Morg style redos on champions like Caitlyn (maybe later on since she recently got a vfx fix) or Corki.

Heres some links for comparison 
https://imgur.com/A0pf7EO
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XR-PI15UGH8

replies.body: I think the goal is to give it a clearly visible AoE, like the teemo R change.

Yeah, the old one was much more visceral. The roiling mushroom, the expanding smoke.
Could've just cleaned it up the AOE edges a bit.
mmm... respectfully disagree. The old one is unnecessarily noisy.

Yes! "Looked better" does not mean it's better for the game.
Not only is it cleaned up, I think it's also less of a performance hit because less particles need to be drawn!

Well, yeah, that.

But I also just prefer the cleaner look. It has more character and fits the visual style of the game better.
it just doesnt lol im sorry
